
### Cleaning and Getting Data course project

An analysis of accelerometer data generated from an experiment with Samsung Galaxy S smartphones.
Contents

- data - This folder contain source of project decribed on it README.txt file
- run_analysis.R - R script to merge, clean-up, transform, and summarize the experiment data.
- Analisis.txt -This file contains the result of the analisis
- Readme.Rmd - This file.
- CoockBoock.Rmd - Codebooks with the data to indicate all the variables and summaries calculated.

### Getting started

-    Read through the CodeBook and the run_analysis.R script to get a general understanding of this project, the steps taken in the analysis, and the output file.
-    Download or clone the project 
-    Load project into Rstudio and run run_analysis.R script.
